attributes.action: Reinstate the Death Penalty for Treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For anti-British terrorists who have accepted our hospitality and welfare benefits and have been found guilty of murder of British citizens and who are trying to force us to adopt their fanatical religious/political views and to cease all benefits to their dependants.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
